## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>PMS2A, TPF2</u>
- **Gene Name:** PHD domain-containing MAS subunit 2A, TRIPLE PHD FINGERS 2
- **Description:**   PHD finger family protein;(source:Araport11)
